About Me

December 12, 2020

Hi there 👋! I am Sealman, a front-end developer from Taiwan. I have a passion for learning new things and sharing my knowledge with others. Recently interested in Vue 3.

I create blog posts mainly about JavaScript and Vue.js. You can see a full list of what I am up to on Sealman's first homepage. If you found any problems in something I have created, please feel free to leave a comment, or contact me on Twitter. 😉
